caption.title: Defective viral genomes are produced during influenza virus infection and are incorporated into virions in vivo.
caption.p: PCR detection of DVGs (top) or viral genome (bottom) of the PA segment in lung extracts (A) and in virions purified from lungs (B) of mice infected with F- or M-IAV isolates. DNA ladder size indicated in nucleotides.
Click here for additional data file.
